content.new:
# Summary

The documentation,  code style, and scripting interfaces in this library needs to be updated. This issue will track progress.

# Work to be done

For each class:

1. Create an example in the `examples` folder. This example should then be used as a doxygen `\snippet` in the class's doxygen description.

2. Check spelling.

3. Check for code style. Set functions should start with `Set`. Don't use `const` with POD types. Etc.

4. Create a scripting interface. See Angle.i as an example.

5. Add more tests so that  coverage is as close to 100% as possible.

6. Target changes to ign-math6. Also, target `default` with any breaking changes.

# Status

1. [x] Angle. See pull request #325 and pull request #326
2. [ ] AxisAlignedBox
3. [ ] Box
4. [ ] Color
5. [ ] Cylinder
6. [ ] DiffDriveOdometry
7. [ ] Filter
8. [ ] Frustum
9. [ ] graph/Edge
10. [ ] graph/GraphAlgorithms
11. [ ] graph/Graph
12. [ ] graph/Vertex
13. [X ] Helpers. See pull request #330.
14. [ ] Inertial
15. [ ] Kmeans
16. [ ] Line2
17. [ ] Line3
18. [ ] MassMatrix3
19. [ ] Material
20. [ ] MaterialType
21. [X ] Matrix3. See pull request #328
22. [ ] Matrix4
23. [ ] MovingWindowFilter
24. [ ] OrientedBox
25. [ ] PID
26. [ ] Plane
27. [X ] Pose3. See pull request #329.
28. [X] Quaternion. See pull request #327.
29. [ ] Rand
30. [ ] RollingMean
31. [ ] RotationSpline
32. [ ] SemanticVersion
33. [ ] SignalStats
34. [ ] Sphere
35. [ ] SphericalCoordiantes
36. [ ] Spline
37. [ ] Stopwatch
38. [X] Temperature. See pull request #339.
39. [ ] Triangle3
40. [ ] Triangle
41. [ ] Vector2
42. [ ] Vector3
43. [ ] Vector3Stats
44. [ ] Vector4
content.old:
# Summary

The documentation,  code style, and scripting interfaces in this library needs to be updated. This issue will track progress.

# Work to be done

For each class:

1. Create an example in the `examples` folder. This example should then be used as a doxygen `\snippet` in the class's doxygen description.

2. Check spelling.

3. Check for code style. Set functions should start with `Set`. Don't use `const` with POD types. Etc.

4. Create a scripting interface. See Angle.i as an example.

5. Add more tests so that  coverage is as close to 100% as possible.

6. Target changes to ign-math6. Also, target `default` with any breaking changes.

# Status

1. [x] Angle. See pull request #325 and pull request #326
